description: React component 'ConnectConfluenceButton' that initiates OAuth flow with Confluence by fetching an authorization URL from the backend and navigating to it.

methods.name: ConnectConfluenceButton
methods.description: React functional component that renders a button to start the OAuth process for Confluence, handling loading state and errors.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Event handler invoked when button is clicked; fetches OAuth URL from backend and redirects the user.
